name: GOCaby
about: GoCaby is your all-in-one app for enhancing your daily lifestyle. Whether you're booking a ride with our Go Ride feature, getting items delivered with ease, ordering your favorite food from nearby restaurants through Go Eat, or paying bills and sharing them with friends and family.

name: AudaXious
about: AudaXious - A cross platform mobile app leveraging AI and Web3 to catalyze engagement, scale healthy communities, and increase product/project reach and adoption.

name: EduCarts
about: EduCarts - A cross platform mobile app that simplifies the hassle of paying international tuition fees, especially from under-developed countries.

name: PiRemit
about: PiRemit - A native android app that simplifies cross border transactions.

name: Oasis
about: Oasis - A cross platform mobile app that connects you with people who love anime as you do.

name: Allon Fasaha
about:
Allon Fasaha - A native offline/online android learning app for out-of-school children in northern Nigeria that aims at reintegrating 75 million out-of-school children back into formal education. 
 This project won the Microsoft Build2030 Hackathon under community challenge in the year 2022
